author: William Feuer
title: US coronavirus cases top 200,000 as virus spreads and testing ramps up
description: Confirmed COVID-19 cases in the U.S. doubled since Friday as the country rolls out broader testing and outbreaks pop up in more and more cities.
content:
Confirmed COVID-19 cases in the U.S. surpassed 200,000 Wednesday, doubling since Friday as the country rolls out broader testing and outbreaks pop up in more and more cities.
The coronavirus has now infected 203,608 people in the U.S., killing at least 4,476… [+2615 chars]
